    • Constructor Detail

      • Boss

        public Boss(float xPos,
            float yPos,
            int numFrames,
            int width,
            int height,
            float speed,
            int health,
            int attackDamage,
            java.lang.String image)
        Creates a new boss
        Parameters:
        xPos - x-coordinate of the render
        yPos - y-coordinate of the render
        numFrames - number of frames in the animation
        width - width
        height - height
        speed - the speed of the character
        health - starting health of the character
        attackDamage - how much damage the character deals

        proWidth - Projectile width

        numberOfPros - Number of standardProjectiles being made
